alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 5:57PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Koochiching and northwestern St. Louis Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 557 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ash Lake, to near Nett Lake, to 18 miles southeast of Littlefork, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ash Lake around 600 PM CDT. Nett Lake around 605 PM CDT. Pelican Lake around 610 PM CDT. Orr and Cusson around 615 PM CDT. Gheen and Buyck around 630 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Greaney, Black Duck Lake and Bois Forte Band Nett Lake Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
